snippet.title: Machine Gun Gardener: Horde Mode Trailer
snippet.description:
Machine Gun Gardener, an arcade style, single player, endless, defense-like wave shooter gets three major updates today: Horde Mode, an upgrade system, and a conclusion to the game if you can stop the horde. These updates bring more depth and replay ability to the game, giving players something new to discover, unlock and experience.

Trailer Music: "Chiptuned ROck Music" by Bertsz - Freesound.org
https://freesound.org/people/Bertsz/

Play for free today!
https://studio11508.itch.io/machine-gun-gardener
